sentence.text: Shwachman-Diamond syndrome (mitotic spindle organization) (OMIM #260400) is a rare inherited bone marrow failure syndrome (IBMFS) that is primarily characterized by neutropenia and exocrine pancreatic insufficiency.
These 3 patients shared congenital neutropenia linked with various other mitotic spindle organization phenotypes.
In conclusion, autosomal dominant mutations in response to drug, a key member of the cotranslation protein-targeting pathway, lead to syndromic neutropenia with a Shwachman-Diamond-like phenotype
